exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="FirstSkin" width="1136" height="758" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Group id="back" width="221" height="78" left="458" bottom="37">
		<e:Image source="btn_back_orangel_up_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label text="返回" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="40" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimHei"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label text="产品介绍" horizontalCenter="0" top="20" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" size="80"/>
	<e:Label text="娃哈哈锌多多钙多多是由爽歪歪优化而来，外包装结合孩子对小黄鸭的清楚认知，设计了精致的瓶身。并且增加了瓶盖，更加健康卫生。 全新的钙多多 锌多多，营养更均衡。娃哈哈爽歪歪的诞生采用国际领先的微胶囊包埋技术，强化了儿童生长发育所需的维生素A、D和维生素B3、B6、B12，还特别添加了，经过优质益生菌发酵后，口感更滑爽、营养更易吸收，给孩子们更多保护、更多健康！而锌多多钙多多则是在爽歪歪的基础上升级而来，更多营养更美味。" x="142" y="144" anchorOffsetX="0" width="854" anchorOffsetY="0" height="470" textColor="0x000000" size="40" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingSkin" width="1400" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" width="1400" source="bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Label id="t_loading" size="67" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" text="100%" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="200" textColor="0xFFFFFF" lineSpacing="12" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="111" height="60"/>
	<e:Label text="资源正在加载中，请稍后..." size="80" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="60"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="mainSkin" width="1136" height="758" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Label id="title" text="娃哈哈钙多多&锌多多" size="80" horizontalCenter="0" top="50" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimHei"/>
	<e:Group id="Second" width="221" height="78" x="715" y="580">
		<e:Image source="btn_back_orangel_up_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label text="广告理念" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="40" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimHei"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="First" width="221" height="78" left="200" bottom="100">
		<e:Image source="btn_back_orangel_up_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label text="产品介绍" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="40" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimHei"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="videoGrp" width="670.66" height="368" x="232.67" y="172.34" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SecondSkin" width="1136" height="758" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Group id="back" width="221" height="78" left="458" bottom="37">
		<e:Image source="btn_back_orangel_up_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label text="返回" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="40" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimHei"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label text="广告理念" horizontalCenter="0" top="20" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" size="80"/>
	<e:Label text="主打“养生”旗号，结合当代年轻人生活饮食不规律的现状，让更多的年轻人关注自己的身体，并在熬夜后能够联想到这款酸奶，随之产生养生的想法。" x="93.28" y="144" anchorOffsetX="0" width="949.45" anchorOffsetY="0" height="470" textColor="0x000000" size="60" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>
